forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: Friday Update for the Special Price of $0.00!

comments.text: Hi all! Here's what's new in version 181.12 (you're on [version]). Enjoy!
The "lock" command is official now, and has been added to the help and auto-complete! Use e.g. "face nearest foo lock x". Thx FirstIteration & all!
New area grounds are locked by default (need a lock click) to protect newcomers accidentally moving/ resizing/ editing a Thing into them! Thx Ampli, LilDoctor, Sloppy, Nic &all!
The Desktop Stream camera options dialog now has an easy one-click "Optimize for recording" button to load a good settings mix to record videos!
This update is available for the spectacular price of $0.00 if you get it within the next 10 million years, but we have a Patreon if you want to support us: patreon.com/anyland
Thanks everyone who supports us, even $1/ month is appreciated!

thread.latestCommentText: Thanks everyone who supports us, even $1/ month is appreciated!
